dcd11ec2-bd43-42bf-a10f-745fcb8ea77b.name: Area Knowledge
dcd11ec2-bd43-42bf-a10f-745fcb8ea77b.notes: Location of its major cities and important sites; awareness of its major customs, ethnic groups, and languages (but not necessarily expertise); names of folk of Status 7+; and a general understanding of the economic and political situation
